attributes.action: consider giving bursaries to students who are studying/going to study subjects that will help us reduce our environmental impact
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There does seem to be a joined up opportunity for us to influence and support industry and the general public in reducing our environmental impact. 

It could be achieved if the Prime Minister 

1.Make funding available/give incentives  for the training for the education of students in degree level courses  in Pollution Reduction, Energy Efficiency, etc

2. Pass legislation that compels industry to employ people devoted to improving efficiency and carbon emmissions for their industry.

3.Design offer benefits for industry for sponsoring such education that can impact on their employees attitudes and actions with regard to energy efficiency /raw material consumption in the workplace. 

If you think this plan could help please sign the petition
